title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 06/26/22
description:
First up, we talked with Donald Trump Jr. about using tech to create a parallel economy, about the havoc Biden is causing in the country, and about the gun laws Republicans are trying to pass, Then we talked with Pete Hegseth, talking about his new book Battle for the American Mind, how the education system has been undermined for more than a century and what we can do to fix it. Finally, Sen. Rand Paul talked to us about a variety of issues including the gun control bill before the Senate, Dr. Fauci and a lot more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

First up, we talked with Donald Trump Jr. about using tech to create a parallel economy, about the havoc Biden is causing in the country, and about the gun laws Republicans are trying to pass, Then we talked with Pete Hegseth, talking about his new book Battle for the American Mind, how the education system has been undermined for more than a century and what we can do to fix it. Finally, Sen. Rand Paul talked to us about a variety of issues including the gun control bill before the Senate, Dr. Fauci and a lot more.
